summary: REQ-43 appears implemented in Footer.tsx by rendering address/phone/hours from content.contactInfo with defaults and splitting hours by newline while retaining existing footer links. REQ-45 appears partially implemented in ContactLocationSection.tsx by reading contactInfo fields with fallbacks and splitting hours by newline, but the diff is truncated before showing the actual rendering for hours and contact/phone card. REQ-44 (admin editor Contact Info tab edits/saves all three fields without overwriting others) cannot be verified from the truncated EditorPage.tsx diff; the shown portion does not include any contactInfo editing UI or update logic.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the admin Editor "Contact Info" tab allows editing and saving address, phone, and business hours (supporting newlines) via the existing save flow, without overwriting other fields.
missing_requirements.reason: EditorPage.tsx is truncated and the visible portion does not show any Contact Info tab inputs for address/phone/hours, nor any specific update logic ensuring edits do not overwrite sibling fields.

missing_requirements.requirement: Public Contact & Location section displays address/phone/hours each in the correct dedicated UI area (location/contact/hours cards) and splits hours by newline with fallbacks.
missing_requirements.reason: Although the section computes address/phone/hours with fallbacks and splits hours by newline, the diff is truncated before confirming that phone is rendered in a dedicated Contact card/line and that hours lines are actually rendered in the Business Hours card (and not overwritten by other fields).
